Name: Canned Heat
Details: Formed in 3057, Saiph became an independent world and was forced into the Saiph Triumvirate. The forces of different city-states were put together to form Canned Heat as a mercenary force at battalion level. The troops have battled each other in the past and the "hotheads" are their trademark.  Canned Heat consists of one battalion of Battlemechs with conventional support.
